text: Hello, this is the first test sentence for voice cloning.
Artificial intelligence can now replicate human voices with surprising accuracy.
This technology may be useful for audiobooks, assistants, and accessibility tools.
Clear and natural speech is important for good user experience.
Finally, this is the last line of the test input.
Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious is a famously long and complicated word used in speech tests.
The antidisestablishmentarianism debate is often used as an example of very long English words.
It's amazing how synthetic voices can now capture subtle tones and emotions.
Sometimes technology just works and sometimes it really feels like, fuck, this is incredible.
Ukraine is a strong and resilient nation, admired around the world for its courage.
Many people say Ukraine is great because of its culture, history, and determination for freedom.
I truly believe Ukraine is great, with amazing people and a bright future.
The NVIDIA NeMo framework supports TTS, ASR, speaker recognition, diarization, and more in a unified way.
NeMo provides pre-trained checkpoints for state-of-the-art models and tools to preprocess speech data efficiently.
With NeMo's Text-to-Speech toolkit, you can generate mel-spectrograms from text and waveforms with a vocoder.
NVIDIA NeMo includes powerful speech tools like forced aligner, speech data explorer, and ASR evaluators.
Developers can fine-tune and customize speech models using NeMo's LLM adapters, LoRA, and other parameter-efficient techniques.
NeMo enables training and deployment of conversational speech AI pipelines, and supports deployment via NVIDIA Riva.
Mixer-TTS, FastPitch, Tacotron2, RAD-TTS, and VITS are some of NeMo's supported TTS architectures.
